programme.title: The Sultan Ep8
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep39
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Duda Ganteng Bikin Kena Mental
programme.desc: Rio yang berstatus duda berebut teksi dengan Marsha yang pada hari itu akan menghadiri temuduga. Namun disebabkan pemandu teksi itu berasa jengkel, akhirnya mereka berdua keluar dari teksi dan teksi itu berlalu pergi tanpa seorang penumpang.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep50
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Bintang Pantura 6 Ep64
programme.desc: Bintang Pantura 6 kini kembali! Juragan Soimah ditemani oleh Nunung (Pembantu Juragan) dan Inul Daratista (Rakan Perniagaan Juragan) akan mencari 40 peserta untuk bertanding di pentas impian. Bersama mentor: Nassar, Via Vallen, Dewi Perssik, Jenita Janet, Happy Asmara dan para Konco Pantura.

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep47
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep51
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Pawang Hati Anti Tanggal Tua
programme.desc: Tiba-tiba muncul seorang lelaki yang entah dari mana dan dia berjaya menambat hati Lilis. Lelaki itu, Supri. Tanpa disedari oleh Lilis, Supri mempunyai agenda tersembunyi. Bukan sekadar untuk mendekati Lilis, tetapi terdapat konflik pada masa lalu yang Supri perlu selesaikan.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV Ep1
programme.desc: SCTV ke-32 tahun menghiburkan rakyat Indonesia. Dalam sambutan ulang tahun SCTV yang ke-32 pada tahun ini, SCTV mempersembahkan pelbagai hiburan yang menyeronokkan dan bermutu tinggi.

programme.title: BUSER Investigasi Ep6
programme.desc: BUSER atau BUru SERgap Investigasi adalah program berita mengenai jenayah yang telah berlaku di Indonesia.

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep47
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent Jun
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.

programme.title: Fist & Furious
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: The Sound Of A Flower
programme.desc: In the strict Confucian society of 19th century Korea, a girl takes destiny into her own hands to become Korea’s first female master singer in the traditional art of pansori.

programme.title: Meet The In-Laws
programme.desc: Hyun Joon and his girlfriend Da Hong are ready to tie the knot, but there's one big problem: Da Hong's father is strongly against him because of his hometown. Will they ever make it to the altar?

programme.title: Voice Of A Murderer
programme.desc: The only son of a news anchor disappears without a trace. A veteran cop and his special task force are assigned on the case, however, the kidnapper catches wind of the police involvement…

programme.title: Cheer Up, Mr Lee!
programme.desc: Unlike his heart-throb appearances, Mr. Lee, who has very child-like characteristics, embarks on a voyage of discovery with his young daughter ‘Saet-byeol’ whom he has just met.

programme.title: The Scam
programme.desc: Hyeon-Soo joins an elite team formed by a gangster-turned-investor who attempt their biggest scam to swindle $60,000,000 from the stock market.

programme.title: Josee
programme.desc: The movie depicts the unforgettable love between Josee, a girl with physical disability and Young-Seok.

programme.title: A Tiger In Winter
programme.desc: On a winter day, a man is kicked out of his girlfriend's apartment. He then begins a job as a substitute driver at night. One night, he meets his ex-girlfriend who now works as a novelist.

programme.title: Master
programme.desc: An intellectual crime investigation team goes after One Network, a company involved in a massive fraud and corruption case in Korea.

programme.title: Will You Be There?
programme.desc: A surgeon’s dying wish is to see his lover who had died in an accident long ago. He receives pills that allow him to travel back in time and tries to save her. There, he also meets his younger self.

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in South Korea, three female office co-workers who enroll in English classes in hopes to advance their careers, struggle to expose the corruption inside their company.

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: Mourning Grave
programme.desc: In-su, with the ability to see ghosts, built a special friendship with a girl ghosts. Meanwhile, his classmates disappeared one by one and rumour says a masked ghost is the culprit.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: Always
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with a blind telemarketer and realizing her blindness was his fault, a former boxer decides to fight in an underground fighting contest to earn money for her surgery.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: Set Me Free
programme.desc: Being abandoned in a group home since young, Young-Jae now struggles to make a living as he's too old to live there anymore.

programme.title: No Mercy
programme.desc: On the journey to find her missing younger sister, she discovered the violence and sexual abuse her sister had suffered and is determined to take a revenge.

programme.title: The Great Battle
programme.desc: A historical film about the siege of Ansi Fortress and the epic 88 days battle that Yang Man-chun and his Goguryeo troops fought against 200,000 invading Tang dynasty men to defend it.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Cheer Up, Mr Lee!
programme.desc: Unlike his heart-throb appearances, Mr. Lee, who has very child-like characteristics, embarks on a voyage of discovery with his young daughter ‘Saet-byeol’ whom he has just met.

programme.title: I Can Speak
programme.desc: An elderly woman forms an unlikely friendship with a junior civil service officer. After realizing that he is proficient in English, she begs he officer to teach her, for reasons of her own.

programme.title: Love, Lies
programme.desc: A gisaeng is consumed by jealousy after her friend finds success as a pop singer and her lover falls for her. Feeling betrayed, things begin to fall apart as she tries to regain the things she lost.

programme.title: Rampant
programme.desc: Returning from imprisonment abroad, a prince and his fellow countrymen band together to battle bloodthirsty demons in ancient Korea.

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: Set Me Free
programme.desc: Being abandoned in a group home since young, Young-Jae now struggles to make a living as he's too old to live there anymore.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A once legendary gangster Dong-chul tries to settle down to enjoy an ordinary life with his wife, but things get hard when he continuously gets tricked into making bad business decisions.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent Jun
programme.desc: While under the influence of alcohol, an unsuccessful comic book writer draws a comic about his life as a former NIS hitman, and runs into trouble when it gets posted online.

programme.title: Rough Cut
programme.desc: When a bad-boy movie star hires a real gangster to take on an opposing role to avoid a scandal after beating a fellow actor half to death, he gets more than he bargained for from this replacement.

programme.title: You Quiz on the Block Ep1
programme.desc: 'Nation's MC' Yoo Jae-suk and Jo Se-ho will chat with celebrities and people from all walks of life, and throw them surprise quizzes!

programme.title: House on Wheels 4 Ep4
programme.desc: Enjoy travelling with Sung Dong-il, Kim Hee-won and Rowoon in a tiny, portable home around Korea bringing only essential belongings in the new season of <House on Wheels>!

programme.title: Europe Outside Your Tent Ep4
programme.desc: Enjoy the virtual tour with the 4 actors! They'll go on camping trips in Europe - rental cars instead of trains, campgrounds instead of hotels, and local marts instead of restaurants.

programme.title: Tale of the Nine Tailed Ep13
programme.desc: A romance fantasy drama that tells the story of a fearless producer determined to hunt down a nine-tailed fox who goes after evils that disrupt the order of the human world.

programme.title: Tale of the Nine Tailed Ep14
programme.desc: A romance fantasy drama that tells the story of a fearless producer determined to hunt down a nine-tailed fox who goes after evils that disrupt the order of the human world.

programme.title: The Road: The Tragedy of One Ep4
programme.desc: Story of a tragedy between two families of the high society following a murder case that exposed ugly desires, secrets and ambitions of residents of the “Royal the Hill”, where only top 1 % elites reside.

programme.title: My Roommate is a Gumiho Ep4
programme.desc: A fantasy romance between Shin Woo-yeo, a 999-year-old nine-tailed fox and Lee Dam, a college student who swallowed the fox’s pearl. Without it, Shin will not be able to attain the human form...

programme.title: Unexpected Business Ep3
programme.desc: <Unexpected Business> features veteran actors Jo In-sung and Cha Tae-hyun who will run a supermarket in the countryside to bond with the locals and blend into the neighborhood.

programme.title: You Quiz on the Block Ep1
programme.desc: 'Nation's MC' Yoo Jae-suk and Jo Se-ho will chat with celebrities and people from all walks of life, and throw them surprise quizzes!

programme.title: The Road: The Tragedy of One Ep4

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep809810
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep3435
programme.desc:
The name “Kaohsiung” has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from “Da Gou”. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiung’s [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly.
The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiung’s century-old history.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep421
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Back To Home (M) Ep1213
programme.desc: When the news reached her that the old village leader had passed away, Xiao Li, who was a personal shopper, stuffed a few things into her Hermes bag and, clutching the lucky salt he had once given her, set out for her home town wearing her Prada high-heeled shoes. That night A-Jian, who was helping out in a Japanese restaurant, also jumped on the bus and headed home as soon as he received the news. In his will, the old man divided up his salt fields among the villagers, but on the condition that A-Jian and Xiao Li get married. When they heard this, A-Jian and Xiao Li found themselves immediately surrounded…

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep833
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep764765
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep644
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep422
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Piggy's Counter-Attack (M) Ep5051
programme.desc: A rich father, who built his fortune from nothing, goes bankrupt overnight when his investments fail. His children are knocked out of heaven and have to launch a counterattack.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: The former SWAT captain, Dong Gu, suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughter’s company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Murderer
programme.desc: A police officer Tai is found seriously hurt while another officer Ling is found lying in a coma at the crime scene. Ling awakens with a memory loss and cannot explain why he was at the scene. As a result, he is accused of attempted murder. While Ling feels aggrieved, he also finds all evidences pointing to him as the murderer...

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: Hong Kong residential property is reported to be the most expensive in the world. Four young Hong Kong residents, each having their own issues, fall into a property speculation trap and are forced to live together in their new flat.

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, “The Eagle Shooting Heroes” is loosely based on Louis Cha’s classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hung’s action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Mr. Possessed
programme.desc: Riley is cursed by an evil spirit to not be able to approach any woman. When he falls in love with Siu Yu, Riley’s mother decides to use her to help him vanquish the evil spirit. On their wedding night, Riley passes out after protecting Siu Yu from the attack of the evil spirit. Can the two finally break the curse?

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: Set in Tin Shui Wai, a marginalised satellite town, Kwai is a middle-aged widow who works hard in a neighbourhood supermarket to support herself and her son. They lead a mundane but fulfilling life. When an elderly woman who lives alone moved in to Tin Shui Wai, Kwai strikes up a friendship with her and helps her ease into a new life.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family’s expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family’s reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: Two Wrongs Make a Right
programme.desc: When an internationally-renowned Feng Shui Master, Ray, forecasts a predestined doom ahead, he sets out to find an ill-fated wretch to serve as the scapegoat of his mishaps and finds Pei Pei. Little did Ray expect to fall in love with her and must decide whether their relationship is worth the series of unfortunate events that would follow.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: The Way Of The Dragon
programme.desc: A young Hong Kong man, Tang Lung arrives at Rome to help a friend of his family, a girl called Chen Ching-hua. She has been threatened by local gangsters who want to takeover her restaurant. Soon after Tang's arrival, the gangsters appear at the restaurant and force Chen to sign over the deed. They laugh at the Chinese style of fighting. Angry Tang challenges and defeats them in an excellent show of his fighting skills. The mastermind of the gang orders Tang's assassination. When this fails, the gang leader hires an international Karate champion form the United States in a last attempt to kill Tang. Tang meets the American in a coliseum and they fight like gladiators to the death.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: Shoplifters
programme.desc: A Japanese family with lowly paid part-time jobs turns to shoplifting to make ends meet. After one shoplifting session, the father Osamu and his son come across a little girl in the cold. Osamu’s wife agrees to take her in after learning her hardships, and they seem to live happily together until an unforeseen incident reveals hidden secrets..

programme.title: Maoshan Heavenly Master
programme.desc: Prisoner Chi flees away under Master Zhang’s custody, causing the latter to be expelled from his clan. On his way to find Chi, Master Zhang arrives at a place where many people vanish for no reason. He soon discovers that it is Chi who captures them to become a serpent demon. The war between human and demon has just begun!

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again…

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Based on real events, the movie follows the footsteps of the fans of Hong Kong Canto-pop diva Anita Mui. After the death of the popstar, fans from different walks of life risk arrest to track down handwritten cards, letters and other possessions from Anita Mui to preserve their idol’s memory.

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur…

programme.title: Fleet of Time
programme.desc: A coming-of-age tale about a group of close friends from high school, college and eventually reaching adulthood through the 1990s and 2000s. They meet again at a friend's wedding in 2014 and recall their romantic past through memories.

programme.title: A Lifetime Treasure
programme.desc: A peaceful home for the elderly is under attack when a gangster and his cronies attempt to set up traps to take over the home! Little did they know that the five elderlies residing in the home have amazing talents to take them head on.

programme.title: Office
programme.desc: Lee Seung is a hopeful and idealistic new hire at a billion-dollar company. However, he soon finds that this new world is more complicated than he thought, with a myriad of illicit relationships, including one between the company chairman and the CEO, and the cutthroat world of finance laid bare before his eyes as the company prepares to go public.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kit’s master, Debo.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Eva’s mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mother’s wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Eva’s heart?

programme.title: 12 Golden Ducks
programme.desc: After “Golden Chickenesss”, this is a comeback story about the misadventures of a group of gigolos, led by Future, trying to make their mark in Hong Kong. As with any profession, they have their share of setbacks, but their ability to find laughter within the tears reflects the drive, passion and the indomitable spirit of the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Adapted from a Japanese fantasy novel, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an city, causing a series of mysterious events. A poet and a Japanese monk band together to follow the trails left by the cat, leading them to discover a buried secret.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Alex Fong and Cecilia So star as two lost souls in this romantic comedy. One has constantly been physically abused and cheated on by his girlfriend, the other was a former beer girl turned into a wandering spirit following a car accident. As the two begin to spend time together, love begins to repair their broken hearts.

programme.title: The Web of Death
programme.desc: To rule the martial arts world, the Head of the Snake Sect seeks to possess a deadly plant called “Five Poison Web”, spreading rumours on its whereabouts. Brothers Xiong and Kit are sent to investigate. Xiong falls in love with Su who has a clue of where the plant is, but she accidentally hurts Kit when seeking the plant, devastating Xiong.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: After a notorious rapist Xiao kills his master and the entire clan, Han the last surviving disciple, decides to take revenge. He must find the legendary Hulong Blade to counter Xiao's Evil Poisonous Sword, but as Han has never seen Xiao before, he is deceived when Xiao poses as an ally to try and steal his Blade in the process.

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar known as 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and tries to steal a diamond from a rich man’s party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chief’s granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: The Dancing Millionaires is of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screens, starring husband & wife team Peter Chen Ho and Betty Loh Ti presenting some extraordinary performances.

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, a young man, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and managed to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gang again while in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung is the son of an entrepreneur of a big corporation. Lian Lian is the niece of a Kindergarten’s principal. Fate has brought them together as Da Yung loses his wallet by mistake when they first met. Further misunderstanding occurs when Da Yung tries to use Lian Lian as an excuse to drive the two women he does not love away.

programme.title: Legend of the Bat
programme.desc: It is rumoured that people can buy anything they desire on the mysterious Island of Bats so long as they have money. The charismatic swordsman Chu Liu Xiang and his friend travel to the island to seek answers but realize they are not the only ones who want to unveil the mystery of this place.

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: The Heroic Ones
programme.desc: The story is set in the Tang Dynasty and David Chiang plays the 13th Prince, a powerful fighter whose prestigious status provokes jealously, leading to a gruesome family feud.

programme.title: Notorious Eight
programme.desc: The young Chen Chi-chin (Liu Yung) loses heavily to experienced gambler Hu Kuan-ten (Lo Lieh). His father loses at cards and dies of shock. Chen appeals to his uncle who summons seven fellow professional gamblers to carry out vengeance. Much more than a gambling film, this is a thrilling melting pot of martial arts stars, extortion, illicit love, poker-face vengeance, and all sorts of edge-of-your-seat gambling duels. Featuring two of the leading action stars of the era, Chen Kuen-tai and Lo Lieh, in a series of intense poker game standoffs. Famed director of the genre, Wong Jing, also has a guest appearance as one of the Notorious Eight.

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A cool jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: The Imperial Tomb Raiders
programme.desc: The story revolves around a maverick, a band of woman warriors and a group of ruthless bandits. The maverick teams up with the woman warriors to battle the bandits seeking to raid the emperor’s tomb.

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun’s warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Murderer Pursues
programme.desc: Wang Chung was a valued actor long before he became a director, but as a filmmaker, he helped create some of the most interesting thrillers Shaw Brothers ever released - including this fascinating crime saga of a Sino-Vietnamese crime gang. Danny Lee stars as a misunderstood refugee while Ray Lui plays a cop struggling against his own conscience to ensure that justice is upheld.

programme.title: Diary of a Lady-killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: Shaolin Hand Lock
programme.desc: Cheng Ying learns the secret 'Shaolin Hand Lock' technique from his father and is on a mission to avenge his death. While his father is killed by an old friend Fang, the actual villian is Lin Hao, a rich evil man. Cheng Ying has to ingratiate himself with Lin Hao and works for him as a bodyguard in order to exact revenge.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor’s death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: The Convict Killer
programme.desc: After spending fifteen years in prison on trumped-up charges for drug smuggling, the martial arts master Teng Piao embarks on a journey to take revenge on the person who sets him up - “Black Leopard”. Unfortunately for Piao, no one knows the real identity of “Black Leopard”, except that there is a black leopard tattoo on his chest.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin’s daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: Return Of The Dead
programme.desc: A long-awaited horror sequel after Enchanted Shadow, this is about three asylum inmates telling their stories. In story one, a husband and wife discover they should be careful what they wish for. A naked female ghost seeks revenge from her watery grave in story two, and a dead prostitute returns as a ghost in the last tale.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: Man Of Iron
programme.desc: Chou Lian Huan (Chen Kuan Tai) is good at fist fighting in Shanghai. In order to please a hostess named Chen Ju Fang (Ching Li), he is willing to sacrifice everything and fight against the son of the gang leader in Shanghai. However, is Chou’s action worth it?

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: Two young men join a rebel group after the Chinese Revolution of 1911 and become patriotic heroes accidentally. Assisted by a warlord’s daughter, they successfully help the rebels steal weapons from the warlord in this action comedy.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang’s fiancé and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him…

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, however, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf for winning the lantern contest. At the same time, Zhao plans for revenge. One day, after Long’s wife suddenly disappeared, Long hears about the story of human lantern, leading him to suspect Zhao may involve in the incident…

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy “House of 72 tenants”, this sequel tells the stories of the tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer money while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: Vanaravayan Vallava
programme.desc: aanavarayan and Vallavarayan are two carefree brothers. Vaanavarayan falls in love with Anjali. However her parents reject the alliance following a spat between Anjali’s father and Vallavarayan. Anjali leaves Vaanavarayan as he doesn’t want to throw his brother for his love.

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Aaron falls in love with Kayalvizhi at first sight but she does not reciprocate. They have to part ways when she starts developing feelings for him.

programme.title: Thunder
programme.desc: After CBI officer Bose recovers from a coma, people start to address him by a different name. However, he soon realises that this is a plot by the state CM to seek revenge for an old rivalry. How Bose rediscovers his past and identity forms the rest of the story.

programme.title: Mapla Singam
programme.desc: Amidst the rivalry of two castes in a village, a leader's daughter falls in love with a boy from the rival caste. Things take a turn when her cousin Anbu falls in love with the boy's sister.

programme.title: Arasangam
programme.desc: Arivarasu goes to Canada to search for his missing brother-in-law. However, he discovers a plot by terrorists to kill all intellectuals in India and stop the country's growth.

programme.title: Asura Guru
programme.desc: The life of a high-tech robber with exceptional skills of evading the law changes when a private detective tries to get a hold of him.

programme.title: Vantha Rajavathan V
programme.desc: The young heir of a rich family sets out to effect a reconciliation between estranged family members.

programme.title: Yaan
programme.desc: Chandru, a jobless man, vows to get a job after the father of his girlfriend opposes their relationship. His joy on getting a job in an Islamic nation ends when he is nabbed there for carrying drugs.

programme.title: Samar
programme.desc: Shankar and Roopa fall in love with each other but she suddenly ends their relationship and moves out of the country. Shankar receives a mysterious invitation from Roopa to come to Bangkok.

programme.title: Jai Hind 2
programme.desc: One man's fight to give good education to the poor.

programme.title: Thirunaal
programme.desc: Blade, a henchman for a local gangster, Naaga, falls in love with Vidhya, the daughter of a factory owner. He has to choose between supporting her father and his boss, who are rivals.

programme.title: Ka Pe Ranasingam
programme.desc: The story is about politics surrounding land and the plight of farmers. It showed Vijay helping poor farmers in their fight against the industries that have acquired their lands.

programme.title: Ko 2
programme.desc: Ko 2 revolves around a man who kidnaps the chief minister of the state and the mystery over why he does so.

programme.title: Velan
programme.desc: A carefree Velan falls in love with his collegemate, Ananya, and plans to marry her. However, a mistake in the decision made by his father, an influential man, puts the couple's romance in jeopardy.

programme.title: Ghazi
programme.desc: In 1971, an Indian Naval submarine, S21, intercepts a Pakistani submarine, PNS Ghazi, during routine surveillance and thwarts its mission of destroying INS Vikrant.

programme.title: Thondan
programme.desc: Narayanan, a politician's son, assaults Vishnu when his brother dies in his ambulance. Later, he makes Vishnu's life miserable by bribing the local police officers and government officials.

programme.title: The Priest
programme.desc: Father Carmen, a priest, joins hands with the police to investigate a series of mysterious suicides. However, he soon stumbles upon a disturbing fact that has serious consequences.

programme.title: Kedi Billa Killadi
programme.desc: The story of two loafing friends, who want to enter politics.

programme.title: Kaalidas
programme.desc: A cop, who suffers from family issues, takes up a peculiar suicide case. The plot thickens as similar cases get reported within a span of a few days.

programme.title: Kanni Raasi
programme.desc: Gemini, a young man, is averse to love and relationships. However, when Anjali, a teacher, moves in next door, she falls for him and tries to change his mind.

programme.title: Billa Pandi
programme.desc: Billa, a kind-hearted construction contractor, is in love with his aunt's daughter, Valli. However, problems arise when another woman, whose house he built, develops feelings for him.

programme.title: Dikkilona
programme.desc: When Mani, a lineworker who is unhappy in his marriage, manages to make a time machine work due to an accident, he goes back in time to change his life.

programme.title: Vinodaya Chittam
programme.desc: A self-centred and dominating man dies in an unfortunate car accident. However, upon his request, he is granted 90 more days to live for a second chance at making things right.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep77
programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Hagola Ep04
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep05
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep56
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep57
programme.desc: Guru’s onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole’s unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of it’s kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep38
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep39
programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo Ep12
programme.desc: Kicko and Super Speedo are out on a mission to be the saviour of Sun City, fighting an array of villains and their set of super cars.

programme.title: Honey Bunny And The Alien Spaceship Ep1
programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep13
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep14
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior

programme.desc: Calypso - After waking up in an unfamiliar sickbay, Craft (Aldis Hodge) finds himself on board a deserted ship, and his only companion and hope for survival is an A.I. computer interface.

programme.title: Star Trek: Short Treks (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: The Brightest Star - Before he was the first Kelpien to join Starfleet, Saru lived a simple life on his home planet of Kaminar with his father and sister. Young Saru yearns to find out what lies beyond his village.

programme.title: Star Trek: Short Treks (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: The Escape Artist - Harry Mudd (Rainn Wilson), back to his old tricks of stealing and double-dealing, finds himself in a precarious position aboard a hostile ship - just in time to try out his latest con.

programme.title: Star Trek: Short Treks (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Q & A - Ensign Spock's (Ethan Peck) first day aboard the U.S.S. Enterprise doesn't go as planned when he and Number One (Rebecca Romijn) are unexpectedly stuck together in a turbo lift.

programme.title: Star Trek: Short Treks (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: The Trouble with Edward - Newly minted Captain Lynne Lucero is excited to take command of the U.S.S.Cabot, until she meets Edward Larkin, an ornery scientist who believes he has found a revolutionary new use for tribbles.

programme.title: Star Trek: Short Treks (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: Ask Not - When an attack on Starbase 28 leaves a surprise prisoner under Cadet Thira Sidhu's (Amrit Kaur) watch, she is faced with making a decision that may threaten her standing in Starfleet.

programme.title: Star Trek: Short Treks (S2) Ep4
programme.desc: The Girl Who Made the Stars - When a lightning storm in space scares a young Michael Burnham, her father aims to ease her fears with a mythical story about a brave little girl who faced her own fears head on.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: Careful What You Wish For - After an NCIS agent is killed during a security detail for the Vice Chief of Naval Operations, the team must determine if this was an assassination attempt or if someone is targeting one of their own.

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children.

programme.title: Flying Fish
programme.desc: Through three different but interconnected stories, we follow three young characters – a young girl, a lovelorn woman and a widow, mother of eight children - and their painful personal journeys set against the backdrop of the Sri Lankan Civil War.

programme.title: Macondo
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Chechen boy Ramasan grows up in Macondo, a refugee settlement on the outskirts of Vienna. Living alone with his mother and two little sisters, Ramasan takes over the role of the father assuming the responsibility for his small family.

programme.title: Duisburg
programme.desc: Based on the real-life “Ferragosto Massacre”, six young Calabrians are killed by assassins outside of a restaurant. Inspectors Battaglia and Block are tasked to manage the case and they discover a bloodthirsty family feud behind the brutal murders.

programme.title: Detective Durant: Murderous Days
programme.desc: Notorious serial killer, Gurnot, is behind bars but a copycat has emerged on the streets. Things get increasingly frightening when detectives Julia and Felix discover that the new killer seems to know too much about Gurnot’s style of killing.

programme.title: Black Bread
programme.desc: Best Film winner at the Goya Awards, 2011, Black Bread unfolds in post-war Catalonia. A young boy discovers the bodies of a man and a boy in the woods and his father is blamed for the deaths. To clear his father’s name, he must find the real killers.

programme.title: Joy of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Murder In The Vercors
programme.desc: In a rural mountain village, a shepherd is found murdered. Suspicion falls on a former teacher, who used to date the victim’s teenage nephew. When the nephew returns to aid the case, tension and buried animosities in the peaceful community erupt.

programme.title: The Spy
programme.desc: Inspired by a thrilling spy story featuring Nazi Germany’s top female spy, Vera von Schalburg. Known as “The Beautiful Spy”, she mysteriously vanished after being caught by the British secret service MI5. Woman, mother, mistress, spy – and double agent.

programme.title: The Violin Teacher
programme.desc: Laerte, a talented violinist, is forced to teach in a public school in a Brazilian slum after failing to get into the renowned São Paulo Symphonic Orchestra. Laerte grows closer to his students but has to make a difficult choice between them and his dream.

programme.title: Flying Fish
programme.desc: Through three different but interconnected stories, we follow three young characters – a young girl, a lovelorn woman and a widow, mother of eight children - and their painful personal journeys set against the backdrop of the Sri Lankan Civil War.

programme.title: Murders In Rochefort
programme.desc: Police Chief Emma is tasked with the case of a murdered corpse in the forest. However, her partner is a previous one-night-stand. Struggling to keep their emotions in check, the duo fumbles their way through the investigation as more bodies show up.

programme.title: Joy of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: Pelican Blood
programme.desc: Weibke and her nine-year-old daughter Nicolina are elated when they finally adopt five-year-old Raya. However, Weibke soon notices Raya displaying abnormally aggressive behavior. With advice from experts, Weibke is forced to make a painful decision.

programme.title: Murder In The Vercors

programme.title: Kids Run
programme.desc: Andi is a former boxer who now struggles as a day labourer. When he loses his job suddenly, he finds himself threatened with the loss of custody of his beloved three children. An amateur boxing competition with a huge prize money becomes his only hope.

programme.title: The Spy
programme.desc: Inspired by a thrilling spy story featuring Nazi Germany’s top female spy, Vera von Schalburg. Known as “The Beautiful Spy”, she mysteriously vanished after being caught by the British secret service MI5. Woman, mother, mistress, spy – and double agent.

programme.title: Love Suddenly
programme.desc: Still hung up on his teenage sweetheart Marie, Jakob sets out to win her back. However, she is under the mistaken impression that he is more successful than he actually is. Soon, Jakob finds himself in a web of lies he cannot escape from.

programme.title: The Order Of Things
programme.desc: Corrado, a policeman in charge of immigration control, meets a young Somali woman on a field assignment in Libya, who left her war-ravaged country to go to Europe. He finds himself having to make a choice between obeying his orders and saving her life.

programme.title: Romancing The Jungle
programme.desc: Eva is a rookie journalist keen on investigating sea piracy. When she is really kidnapped by pirates in Thailand, she is forced to fight for her life. With her is a hunky smuggler called Nik, and together, the comedic duo band together to survive.

programme.title: The Order Of Things
programme.desc: Corrado, a policeman in charge of immigration control, meets a young Somali woman on a field assignment in Libya, who left her war-ravaged country to go to Europe. He finds himself having to make a choice between obeying his orders and saving her life.

programme.title: Opposites Attract
programme.desc: Claudia is a divorce lawyer. Stefano is a couple’s therapist. Both are single adults with offices opposite one another. When they start seeing one another’s clients, fiery rivalry and sizzling passion erupt in this modern Italian love story.

programme.title: Romancing The Jungle
programme.desc: Eva is a rookie journalist keen on investigating sea piracy. When she is really kidnapped by pirates in Thailand, she is forced to fight for her life. With her is a hunky smuggler called Nik, and together, the comedic duo band together to survive.

programme.desc: Sophie has just started her studies, but her life is turned upside down when she is diagnosed with cancer. However, her lust for life drives her to break free from her illness, and she does so with nine wigs, each bringing out an aspect of herself.

programme.title: Arcadia
programme.desc: In this searing family drama, a family is traveling across California towards a better life. However, their mother is not with them. Through the eyes of young Greta, the heart-breaking dysfunctionality of the humble suburban family emerges.

programme.title: In-Laws In The Outback
programme.desc: The Kowlaskis and the Von Zagenheim’s marriages are on the verge of a breakdown when their children decide to get married. They travel to the South African bush for the wedding but lose their way en-route and stumble into an illegal diamond mine.

programme.title: Hide N' Run
programme.desc: A little girl’s game of “police and thief” with her father is interrupted by the outbreak of riots. Through her perspective, we follow her as she escapes from the shophouse unaware of the chaos unfolding around her.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 6
programme.desc: Veronica investigates possible fraud at school in the election of student council president after Duncan wins, defeating a more popular but less affluent student who promised to eliminate the wealthy students' on-campus perquisites. Meanwhile, Logan causes a public relations nightmare for his movie star parents Aaron and Lynn Echolls (recurring guest stars and real-life couple HARRY HAMLIN - "L.A. Law" and LISA RINNA - "Melrose Place") when footage of him organizing boxing matches between homeless men is posted on the Internet and leaked to the media. Later, Veronica and Keith learn that the man who admitted to murdering Lilly is set to be executed, but a second look at crime scene photographs puts his confession in question.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 7
programme.desc: Veronica becomes suspicious when her pregnant upstairs neighbor suddenly goes missing, prompting both Keith and Veronica to investigate the girl's disappearance. Veronica is also shocked to learn that her mother and Duncan's father were high schoolsweethearts. Meanwhile, it appears that Weevil and the late Lilly Kane once had a romantic relationship.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 8
programme.desc: A popular online "purity test" provides the students of Neptune High School with entertainment until someone makes public everyone's private results, humiliating and embarrassing several students, including Meg (recurring guest star ALONA TAL), a nice girl with whom Veronica sympathizes. Veronica searches for the culprit along with computer geek Mac (recurring guest star TINA MAJORINO - "Napoleon Dynamite"). Meanwhile, Keith helps Wallace and his mom with their unruly tenant. Later, Veronica meets with condemned killer Abel Koontz (CHRISTIAN CLEMENSON) to get answers about Lilly's murder.

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 9
programme.desc: The wealthy parents of a Neptune High senior hire Mars Investigations to look into a cultish group their son, Casey (JONATHAN BENNETT), has joined. Veronica cozies up to Casey and infiltrates "The Farm" to learn more about its operation and its charismatic leader. Meanwhile, Veronica attempts to dispel a condemned killer's contention that her real father is Jake Kane.

programme.desc: When Abbott's old boss, Agent Peterson (DYLAN BAKER), threatens Abbotts career - and possibly his freedom - Jane devises a risky plan to protect his friend's future.

programme.desc: The mother lode of all containers makes landfall. Jason and Matt go all in, but will their hunches pay off? Or will beauty queen Deana's fashion sense reel in the ultimate score? A surprise twist could change every rule in the book.

programme.title: Container Wars S2 5
programme.desc: Jason's got the inside track on a container that could have him coasting to paradise, but will some rotten contents spoil his score?

programme.title: Friends S7 19
programme.desc: Monica's gorgeous cousin (DENISE RICHARDS) unwittingly wreaks havoc on Chandler and Ross. Rachel and Phoebe hastily plan a surprise bridal party for Monica.

programme.title: Friends S7 20
programme.desc: Rachel reveals a titillating secret about her and a former sorority sister (WINONA RYDER). Ross and Chandler compete for wedding tuxedos.

programme.title: Friends S7 21
programme.desc: As Monica and Chandler prepare their wedding vows, they and their friends reminisce. The episode features numerous clips from previous episodes.

programme.title: Friends S7 22
programme.desc: Chandler confronts his estranged cross-dressing father (KATHLEEN TURNER). Rachel gets into trouble driving Monica's Porsche.

programme.title: Kung Fu S3 6
programme.desc: Nicky finds herself dealing with a crime wave in Chinatown which brings her into contact with the vigilante Bo while a mysterious and surprising return from someone in Nicky's past changes everything.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 8
programme.desc: Don't touch that remote, it's time for 20 of the World's Dumbest TV Shows... from Brazilian cross dressers and out-of-control bounty hunters, to a reverend who curses up a storm, insane mixed martial arts, and the cheesiest superhero ever to pretendto fly. With hilarious commentary from comedians like Jared Logan, Judy Gold, and Chris Fairbanks.

programme.title: Chaos Walking
programme.desc: Two companions go on a perilous adventure on an unexplored planet as they escape a dangerous reality where all thoughts are seen and heard by everyone.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Welcome to Rekall, the company that can turn your dreams into real memories. For a factory worker named Douglas Quaid, even though he has a beautiful wife who he loves, the mind-trip sounds like the perfect vacation from his frustrating life - real memories of life as a super-spy might be just what he needs. But when the procedure goes horribly wrong, Quaid becomes a hunted man. Finding himself on the run from the police - controlled by Chancellor Cohaagen, the leader of the free world - Quaid teams up with a rebel fighter to find the head of the underground resistance and stop Cohaagen. The line between fantasy and reality becomes blurred, and the fate of his world hangs in the balance as Quaid discovers his true identity, his true love, and his true fate.

programme.desc: Monogamy - When a pregnant woman's unborn child is ripped from her abdomen in an horrific attack, the detectives go on a frantic search for the child, in the hopes that it could have survived.

programme.desc: The Germans - Sybil is in hospital for an ingrowing toenail, but is still nagging Basil by telephone. During a chaotic fire drill, the moose’s head knocks him out, giving him concussion.

programme.desc: Pick A Con..Any Con - Sam tries to set up a sting to catch a crooked poker player.

programme.desc: Echos From The Past - Hawke is involved in a plane crash and awakens to find a year has passed.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep07
programme.desc: Soul Survivor - In an attempt to save her boss' soul, Paige goes behind her sisters backs and makes a deal with a demon. Meanwhile, Piper learns that Wyatt has been sabotaging her dates.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Speak The Truth - Endora gives Darrin a statue that causes any mortal within three feet to tell the truth. The statue ends up causing some problems for Darrin.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep13
programme.desc: If The Shoe Fits - Jessica comes to the defense of a Cabot Cove newcomer (Season Hubley) who is suspected in the murder of the town lecher (Bruce Glover).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep01
programme.desc: Repression - When 18-year-old Meghan is aided by her therapist in recalling childhood molestation by her father she reports the incest to Detectives Benson and Stabler in hopes of sparing her younger sisters the same fate.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep02
programme.desc: Wrath - When three unrelated people connected to cases that were handled by Detective Benson are found ritualistically murdered, all the evidence points to Benson as the true target of the violence.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep03
programme.desc: Stolen - When a baby is stolen from her mother in a grocery store, Detectives Benson and Stabler soon discover that the kidnapping is only the tip of the iceberg in a baby snatching-and-selling scheme.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep07
programme.desc: Nurse Doctor - Father Mulcahy has been spending a lot of time with Lt. Gail Harris, a new nurse at the 4077th. Mulcahy has been helping Gail in her studies for the medical boards and encouraging her in her endeavors to become a doctor. Meanwhile, the rest of the unit is growing more and more concerned about the dwindling water supply. An uncomfortable moment occurs when Father Mulcahy is conducting a study session with Gail and she makes amorous advances towards him, thinking that his friendliness was something more. The young lieutenant is made even more uncomfortable by Hot Lips’ cool demeanor towards her and she asks Col. Potter for a transfer. Colonel Potter finds the root of the problem and makes arrangements so that Gal can continue with her medical studies and feel comfortable in her surroundings.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep08
programme.desc: Private Finance - Money is the source of all trouble for Hawkeye and Klinger lately. Hawkeye promises a soldier on his deathbed that he will make sure the G.I.’s family will receive money he has willed to them; the only problem is that the soldier made the money through illegal means. Meanwhile Klinger offers money to aid a young Korean woman which is misinterpreted by the girl's mother. Hawkeye continues to grapple with his own conscience versus keeping his word. Klinger finally overcomes the language barrier with the girl’s mother; when she finds that his intentions towards her daughter were honorable everyone breathes a sigh of relief.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep09
programme.desc: Mr. & Mrs. Who - Charles returns from his leave; much to his surprise, the next day a woman appears at the 4077th claiming to be his wife. Charles seems to have had a lot to drink on his leave and doesn’t remember anything that happened. Meanwhile, B.J and Potter decide to try a new treatment, which unfortunately for them violates an I-Corps directive. Luckily for Charles, the new Mrs. Winchester confesses that she made the whole thing up and they aren’t actually married but she does fill him in on the details of their wild time in Tokyo. B.J. and Potter have a lot of explaining to do when Corporal Shaw from I-Corps pays them a visit.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep10
programme.desc: The Yalu Brick Road - A Thanksgiving Day feast turns ugly when the entire 4077th contracts food poisoning from the turkey Klinger found for the meal. Hawkeye and B.J. rush out to find much needed antibiotics for the unit and become horribly lost on the way, wrecking their jeep and wandering the countryside until they are rescued by a very peculiar North Korean soldier who leads them home.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep09
programme.desc: Test of Wills - Jessica is invited to visit the island retreat of a millionaire (Gene Barry) who believes his life is in danger.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep10
programme.desc: Class Act - A Los Angeles homicide detective (Barry Newman) confronts a baffling murder case with political overtones which places his career in jeopardy.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep11
programme.desc: Town Father - Jessica may be forced into public office when a woman (Lee Purcell) arrives in town claiming Cabot Cove's bachelor mayor (Richard Paul) is the father of her five children.

programme.title: The Love Boat S2 Ep07
programme.desc: Ship Of Ghouls - The Amazing Alonzo (Vincent Price) performs illusions for his adoring fans (Jane Kean, Iris Adrian and Bibi Osterwald) while neglecting his fiancé (Joan Blondell). A boy (Charlie Aiken) and his friend tell lies to the crew to get attention, while his parents (Gary Collins and Mary Ann Mobley) are not aware of his mischief. Julie's (Lauren Tewes) friend (Barbara Anderson), a former model, comes aboard after suffering a car accident, leaving her face scarred.

Stubing (Gavin MacLeod) is reunited with his daughter (Jill Whelan); former songwriter Charlie (Robert Goulet) encounters his ex-partner Burt (Richard Dawson) on board; secretary Sandy (Jo Anne Worley) takes a cruise with her boss Victor (Soupy Sales), after they get drunk at a party; a Soviet cruise line Commissar (Loretta Swit) falls for Doc (Bernie Kopell).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep04
programme.desc: Rooftop - When a series of increasingly violent rapes occurs in an African-American community, Detectives Bensonand Stabler are quick to suspect a known sex-offender recently released from prison.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep05
programme.desc: Tangled - When a doctor is murdered and his wife raped, Detectives Benson and Stabler look to the dead man's estranged and troubled son from a previous marriage and a disgruntled former patient as likely suspects.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep11
programme.desc: Life Time - B.J. must battle both the clock and his conscience when a soldier may be permanently paralyzed unless he relieves an aortal replacement within twenty minutes and the only donor candidate is B.J.’s own patient, a soldier who has no brain function but is still hanging on. Although all of the medical staff agree with B.J. that his patient has no hope for recovery as the brain damage is permanent, the soldier’s best friend is also amongst the wounded and makes a plea for his friend that B.J. finds hard to ignore. Finally, the young G.I. understands that his friend is gone and his sacrifice will save the life of another man. For B.J. it is more than just another donor and he turns to his friends for support.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep12
programme.desc: Dear Uncle Abdul - Klinger’s new position as company clerk gives him new insight into the inner workings of the 4077th, and he makes several attempts to write to his Uncle Abdul back in Toledo while also trying to adjust to the demands of his new job. Klinger’s narration of a slice of life at the 4077th reveals the humor of camp life from Klinger’s perspective. Day-to-day 4077th humor topped off with the description of Hawkeye and B.J. competing to be the funniest man at M*A*S*H gives Klinger’s Uncle Abdul a letter worth waiting for.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep13
programme.desc: Captains Outrageous - Rosie is injured in a bar fight in her own bar and it is up to the doctors of the 4077th to keep the bar running in her absence. While Hawkeye and B.J. mix drinks, Col. Potter is faced with a more serious dilemma: Father Mulcahy is up for promotion again and fears that his request will again be denied and wants the Colonel to help him. Colonel Potter’s calls lead him all the way to the Pentagon, where he discovers the delay is due to a simple mix up.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep14
programme.desc: Stars and Stripe - B.J. and Winchester work together to save a soldier’s life during a perilous operation, but conflict occurs when they are asked to co-author a report on the surgery for a prestigious medical journal. While neither doctor wants to take all of the credit, both would like to claim most of it for themselves and a battle of wills ensues. Meanwhile, Hot Lips receives a visit from her combat soldier beau Scully, and is disappointed when she hears that he has been demoted for disobeying a superior officer. Charles and B.J. finally realize that their surgical success was due to their cooperative efforts and they finally work together to finish their report. Hot Lips discovers that when it comes to her feelings for Scully, rank is not an issue, and he in turn sees that she is more of a woman to him than a Major.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep15
programme.desc: Yessir, That's Our Baby - A baby is abandoned at the 4077th, the product of a union of an American GI and a Korean woman. The unit has seen first hand the poor treatment that mixed-race children receive in Korean society and everyone bands together to help find a suitable loving home for the orphan. The longer the baby remains in their care the more attached everyone becomes to the child, and the parting is truly sweet sorrow.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep16
programme.desc: Bottle Fatigue - Hawkeye is stunned and horrified at the size of his monthly bar tab at the Officer’s club, and decides to give up all booze for an entire week. Everyone is supportive until Hawkeye tries to impose sobriety on everyone else in the unit, including his own date. Meanwhile, Charles learns of his sister’s plans to marry and he decides he must stop the nuptials at any cost as he considers her fiancé to be unworthy of the lofty Winchester family. Unfortunately for Charles, the tables are quickly turned on him and he must once again eat his words.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep12
programme.desc: Goodbye Charlie - The questionable identity of a body found by a railroad track leads to murder and becomes the inspiration for Jessica's latest novel.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep13
programme.desc: If The Shoe Fits - Jessica comes to the defense of a Cabot Cove newcomer (Season Hubley) who is suspected in the murder of the town lecher (Bruce Glover).

programme.title: The Love Boat S2 Ep09
programme.desc: Chubs/ Locked Away/ Till Death Do Us Part -- Maybe - Widow Ellen Garner is followed by her husband Mickey's ghost who tries to fix her up. Divorced Les and Gail see their daughter and her husband off but get locked in an unused cabin. Gopher's sister Jennifer makes a beeline for Doc.

programme.title: The Love Boat S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Tony's Family/ The Minister & The Stripper/ Her Own Two Feet - Reverend Whitney's blind date faces scorn from parishioner Barbara Sharp. Bert Wilder helps his wife Audrey deal with being blind. Princess engineer Tony's vacation plans change, so Julie and Gopher invite his family on a free cruise.

programme.title: Cheers S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Father Knows Last - Carla surprises everyone when she announces who her baby's father is.

programme.title: Cheers S1 Ep16
programme.desc: The Boys In The Bar - Sam’s shocked when his ex-teammate comes out of the closet.

programme.title: Cheers S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Diane's Perfect Date - Sam unknowingly hires and ex-murderer to escort Diane on a double date.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep05
programme.desc: Love's a Witch - Paige meets an attractive male witch and wants to help end the magical feud between his and another magical family. After she refuses Piper and Phoebe's help, she winds up possessed.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep06
programme.desc: My Three Witches - The Halliwell sisters attempt to escape magical alternate realities where their secret desires come true, after Chris uses the demon Gith to try to teach them a lesson.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep07
programme.desc: Soul Survivor - In an attempt to save her boss' soul, Paige goes behind her sisters backs and makes a deal with a demon. Meanwhile, Piper learns that Wyatt has been sabotaging her dates.

programme.title: Airwolf S1 Ep6
programme.desc: One Way Express - Hawke and Dominic clash over who will pilot a dangerous stunt for a film, which proves to be a cover for a robbery

programme.title: Airwolf S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Echos From The Past - Hawke is involved in a plane crash and awakens to find a year has passed.

programme.title: The Jewel In The Crown Ep13
programme.desc: The Moghul Room - Perron investigates the secrets in Merrick's past.

programme.title: The Jewel In The Crown Ep14
programme.desc: Pandora's Box - Susan struggles to regain her balance after Merrick's accident.

programme.title: The Jewel In The Crown Ep15
programme.desc: The Division of the Spoils - Merrick's demise is recounted in full.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Aunt Clara's Old Flame - Aunt Clara fears that her old boyfriend will discover her powers dimming with age unlike Hedley who seems as powerful as he was when he was younger.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep12
programme.desc: A Little Strange Visitor - Samantha agrees to keep a ten-year-old warlock, Merle, overnight. But Merle has to promise to not do any magic in front of Darrin.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep13
programme.desc: My Boss, The Teddy Bear - Endora wants Samantha to attend a family wedding, and asks Larry if he will give Darrin some time off so he can travel with her. Larry agrees.

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep14
programme.desc: Speak The Truth - Endora gives Darrin a statue that causes any mortal within three feet to tell the truth. The statue ends up causing some problems for Darrin.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep02
programme.desc: The Ice Queen Cometh - After discussing adolescent sex drive, testosterone levels and sexual peaks for men and women with his friend Vinnie, Doogie finds himself attracted to the stunning Dr. Victoria Burke

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep03
programme.desc: A Stitch Called Wanda - Doogie feels the angst of young love when he asks Wanda to be his girlfriend. Both of them double date with Vinnie and Janine, and while driving to the local make-out spot, Wanda has a stomach upset.
